short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Never miss an important date! Manage your loved one’s wish lists and get reminders so you never forget to send a gift.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you guilty of missing people’s birthdays or shopping for gifts at the last minute? 

Add Brightly Boxed to your browser so you never miss an important date! Brightly Boxed will send you important date reminders, like birthdays and holidays, so you never forget to send a gift again. 

Connect with your loved ones and get their wish list to take all the guesswork out of the gift buying process.

If you need gift ideas we offer a variety of gifts for purchase on our website!
